results.title: Ink Business Cash℠ Credit Card
results.desc: Earn $300 bonus cash back when you spend $3,000 on purchases in the first 3 months from account opening. Named A Great Card for Small Businesses (Kiplinger’s Personal Finance, September 2016). Earn 5% cash back on the first $25,000 spent in combined purchases at office supply stores and on cellular phone, landline, internet and cable TV services each account anniversary year. Earn 2% cash back on the first $25,000 spent in combined purchases at gas stations and restaurants each account anniversary year. Earn 1% cash back on all other card purchases with no limit to the amount you can earn. 0% introductory APR for 12 months on purchases and balance transfers. Employee cards at no additional cost. No Annual Fee.

ratingDetails.bottomLine: A good option for businesses that are willing to pass on added features for more rewards.
ratingDetails.pros: A great intro offer, higher rewards rates for select services and purchases, no annual fee, and rewards flexibility.
ratingDetails.cons: Limited rewards categories, fewer travel benefits.

results.title: The Blue Business℠ Plus Credit Card from American Express
results.desc: Get rewarded for business as usual. Earn 2X points on everyday business purchases such as office supplies or client dinners. 2X applies to the first $50,000 in purchases per year, 1 point per dollar thereafter. Enjoy the flexibility to put more purchases on the Card and earn rewards when you buy above your credit limit*. More buying power for your business* means more opportunities to earn points. That’s everyday business with the new Blue Business Plus Card. *The amount you can spend above your credit limit is not unlimited. It adjusts with your use of the Card, your payment history, credit record, financial resources known to us, and other factors. 0.0% intro APR on purchases and balance transfers for 15 months, then a variable rate, currently 12.24%, 16.24% or 20.24%, based on your creditworthiness and other factors as determined at the time of account opening. No Annual Fee. Terms Apply.

ratingDetails.bottomLine: This is a good no-fee business card with an attractive intro financing offer.
ratingDetails.pros: Competitive intro APR offer and rewards rate. No annual fee.

results.title: SimplyCash® Plus Business Credit Card from American Express
results.desc: Special Offer: Earn up to $400 cash back. Earn a $200 statement credit after you spend $5,000 in qualifying purchases on your Card within the first 6 months of Card Membership. Plus, earn an additional $200 statement credit after you spend an additional $10,000 or more in qualifying purchases on your Card within the first year of Card Membership. No Annual Fee. Plus, more buying power and more cash back. Get cash back on business purchases, even those above your credit limit. 5% cash back on wireless telephone services purchased directly from U.S. service providers and U.S. office supply stores. 3% on the category of your choice from a list of eight and 1% cash back on other purchases. 5% and 3% apply to the first $50,000 in purchases per calendar year, then 1% applies thereafter. Cash back received is automatically credited to your statement. Terms and limitations apply.

ratingDetails.bottomLine: This card is great for those who want to earn cash back for their frequent business purchases.
ratingDetails.pros: High rates of cash back for business spending. Attractive intro financing offer. No annual fee.
ratingDetails.cons: Limit on annual bonus cash back, foreign transaction fee.

results.title: Capital One® Spark® Miles for Business
results.desc: Earn 2 miles per $1 on every purchase, every day • Plus, a one-time bonus of 50,000 miles once you spend $4,500 on purchases within 3 months from account opening • Miles won’t expire for the life of the account, and there are no categories to limit where or what you buy • $0 intro annual fee for the first year; $59 after that • There’s no limit to the amount of miles you can earn • Redeem miles for travel, cash back, gift cards and more • No foreign transaction fees and fly on any airline, anytime, with no blackout dates or seat restrictions

ratingDetails.bottomLine: A good option for businesses that want to earn rewards at a higher rate, as long as you pay on time.
ratingDetails.pros: A great intro rewards offer with rewards flexibility, solid benefits, for those with excellent credit.
ratingDetails.cons: Above average interest rate, steep penalties for late payments, a $59 annual fee after the first year.

results.title: Bank of America® Business Advantage Cash Rewards Mastercard® credit card
results.desc: Earn 2 miles per $1 on every purchase, every day • Plus, a one-time bonus of 50,000 miles once you spend $4,500 on purchases within 3 months from account opening • Miles won’t expire for the life of the account, and there are no categories to limit where or what you buy • $0 intro annual fee for the first year; $59 after that • There’s no limit to the amount of miles you can earn • Redeem miles for travel, cash back, gift cards and more • No foreign transaction fees and fly on any airline, anytime, with no blackout dates or seat restrictions

ratingDetails.bottomLine: With a high rewards cap, this card can bring in great rewards.
ratingDetails.pros: 0% Intro APR offer. No annual fee. A high rewards cap of $250,000 on 3% categories. (Annual cap of $250,000 on combined gas station and office supply store purchases; then 1% earn rate after that)
ratingDetails.cons: Limited categories for rewards (3% at gas stations and office supply stores, 2% at restaurants, and only 1% on all other purchases.)
